verses.verse: ( The Heavens Declare the Glory of God) לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> lam·naṣ·ṣê·aḥ For the choirmaster. מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> miz·mō·wr A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> lə·ḏā·wiḏ of David. הַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <WH8064> haš·šā·ma·yim The heavens מְֽסַפְּרִ֥ים <WH5608> mə·sap·pə·rîm declare כְּבֽוֹד־ <WH3519> kə·ḇō·wḏ- the glory אֵ֑ל <WH410> ’êl of God; וּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> ū·ma·‘ă·śêh the work יָ֝דָ֗יו <WH3027> yā·ḏāw of His hands. מַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> mag·gîḏ proclaim הָרָקִֽיעַ׃ <WH7549> hā·rā·qî·a‘ the skies

י֣וֹם <WH3117> yō·wm Day לְ֭יוֹם <WH3117> lə·yō·wm after day יַבִּ֣יעַֽ <WH5042> yab·bî·a‘ they pour forth אֹ֑מֶר <WH562> ’ō·mer speech; וְלַ֥יְלָה <WH3915> wə·lay·lāh night לְּ֝לַ֗יְלָה <WH3915> lə·lay·lāh after night יְחַוֶּה־ <WH2331> yə·ḥaw·weh- they reveal דָּֽעַת׃ <WH1847> dā·‘aṯ knowledge.

אֵֽין־ <WH369> ’ên- Without אֹ֭מֶר <WH562> ’ō·mer speech וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> wə·’ên or דְּבָרִ֑ים <WH1697> də·ḇā·rîm language, בְּ֝לִ֗י <WH1097> bə·lî ... נִשְׁמָ֥ע <WH8085> niš·mā‘ to be heard, ( Or There is no speech or language where their voice is not heard) קוֹלָֽם׃ <WH6963> qō·w·lām without a sound

בְּכָל־ <WH3605> bə·ḵāl into all הָאָ֨רֶץ׀ <WH776> hā·’ā·reṣ the earth, יָ֘צָ֤א <WH3318> yā·ṣā has gone out קַוָּ֗ם <WH6957> qaw·wām their voice ( LXX, Syriac, and Vulgate; Hebrew their measuring line) וּבִקְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> ū·ḇiq·ṣêh to the ends תֵ֭בֵל <WH8398> ṯê·ḇêl of the world. ( Cited in ) מִלֵּיהֶ֑ם <WH4405> mil·lê·hem their words לַ֝שֶּׁ֗מֶשׁ <WH8121> laš·še·meš for the sun. שָֽׂם־ <WH7760> śām- He has pitched אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> ’ō·hel a tent בָּהֶֽם׃ Prep│3mp ( bā·hem) In [the heavens]

וְה֗וּא <WH1931> wə·hū - כְּ֭חָתָן <WH2860> kə·ḥā·ṯān Like a bridegroom יֹצֵ֣א <WH3318> yō·ṣê emerging מֵחֻפָּת֑וֹ <WH2646> mê·ḥup·pā·ṯōw from his chamber, יָשִׂ֥ישׂ <WH7797> yā·śîś rejoicing כְּ֝גִבּ֗וֹר <WH1368> kə·ḡib·bō·wr like a champion לָר֥וּץ <WH7323> lā·rūṣ to run אֹֽרַח׃ <WH734> ’ō·raḥ his course,

מִקְצֵ֤ה <WH7097> miq·ṣêh at one end הַשָּׁמַ֨יִם׀ <WH8064> haš·šā·ma·yim of the heavens מֽוֹצָא֗וֹ <WH4161> mō·w·ṣā·’ōw it rises וּתְקוּפָת֥וֹ <WH8622> ū·ṯə·qū·p̄ā·ṯōw and runs its circuit עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- to קְצוֹתָ֑ם <WH7098> qə·ṣō·w·ṯām the other; וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> wə·’ên nothing נִ֝סְתָּ֗ר <WH5641> nis·tār is deprived מֵֽחַמָּתוֹ׃ <WH2535> mē·ḥam·må̄·ṯō of its warmth.

תּ֘וֹרַ֤ת <WH8451> tō·w·raṯ The Law יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD תְּ֭מִימָה <WH8549> tə·mî·māh is perfect, מְשִׁ֣יבַת <WH7725> mə·šî·ḇaṯ reviving נָ֑פֶשׁ <WH5315> nā·p̄eš the soul; עֵד֥וּת <WH5715> ‘ê·ḏūṯ the testimony יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD נֶ֝אֱמָנָ֗ה <WH539> ne·’ĕ·mā·nāh is trustworthy, מַחְכִּ֥ימַת <WH2449> maḥ·kî·maṯ making wise פֶּֽתִי׃ <WH6612> pe·ṯî the simple.

פִּקּ֘וּדֵ֤י <WH6490> piq·qū·ḏê The precepts יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD יְ֭שָׁרִים <WH3477> yə·šā·rîm are right, מְשַׂמְּחֵי־ <WH8055> mə·śam·mə·ḥê- bringing joy לֵ֑ב <WH3820> lêḇ to the heart; מִצְוַ֥ת <WH4687> miṣ·waṯ the commandments יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD בָּ֝רָ֗ה <WH1249> bā·rāh are radiant, מְאִירַ֥ת <WH215> mə·’î·raṯ giving light עֵינָֽיִם׃ <WH5869> ‘ê·nā·yim to the eyes.

יִרְאַ֤ת <WH3374> yir·’aṯ The fear יְהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD טְהוֹרָה֮ <WH2889> ṭə·hō·w·rāh is pure, עוֹמֶ֪דֶת <WH5975> ‘ō·w·me·ḏeṯ enduring forever לָ֫עַ֥ד <WH5703> lā·‘aḏ ...; מִֽשְׁפְּטֵי־ <WH4941> miš·pə·ṭê- the judgments יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD אֱמֶ֑ת <WH571> ’ĕ·meṯ are true, צָֽדְק֥וּ <WH6663> ṣā·ḏə·qū righteous. יַחְדָּֽו׃ <WH3162> yaḥ·dāw being altogether

הַֽנֶּחֱמָדִ֗ים <WH2530> han·ne·ḥĕ·mā·ḏîm They are more precious מִ֭זָּהָב <WH2091> miz·zā·hāḇ than gold, וּמִפַּ֣ז <WH6337> ū·mip·paz pure gold; רָ֑ב <WH7227> rāḇ than much וּמְתוּקִ֥ים <WH4966> ū·mə·ṯū·qîm they are sweeter מִ֝דְּבַ֗שׁ <WH1706> mid·də·ḇaš than honey, וְנֹ֣פֶת <WH5317> wə·nō·p̄eṯ from the comb. צוּפִֽים׃ <WH6688> ṣū·p̄îm than honey

גַּֽם־ <WH1571> gam- By them indeed עַ֭בְדְּךָ <WH5650> ‘aḇ·də·ḵā Your servant נִזְהָ֣ר <WH2094> niz·hār is warned; בָּהֶ֑ם Prep│3mp ( bā·hem) in בְּ֝שָׁמְרָ֗ם 8104 Prep-b│V-Qal-Inf│3mp ( bə·šā·mə·rām) keeping them עֵ֣קֶב 6118 N-ms ( ‘ê·qeḇ) reward. רָֽב׃ 7227 Adj-ms ( rāḇ) [is] great

שְׁגִיא֥וֹת <WH7691> šə·ḡî·’ō·wṯ his own errors? מִֽי־ <WH4310> mî- Who יָבִ֑ין <WH995> yā·ḇîn can discern מִֽנִּסְתָּר֥וֹת <WH5641> min·nis·tā·rō·wṯ from my hidden faults. נַקֵּֽנִי׃ <WH5352> naq·qê·nî Cleanse me

גַּ֤ם <WH1571> gam also מִזֵּדִ֨ים׀ <WH2086> miz·zê·ḏîm from willful sins; חֲשֹׂ֬ךְ <WH2820> ḥă·śōḵ Keep עַבְדֶּ֗ךָ <WH5650> ‘aḇ·de·ḵā Your servant אַֽל־ <WH408> ’al- may they not יִמְשְׁלוּ־ <WH4910> yim·šə·lū- rule בִ֣י Prep│1cs ( ḇî) over me. אָ֣ז 227 Adv ( ’āz) Then אֵיתָ֑ם 8552 V-Qal-Imperf-1cs ( ’ê·ṯām) I will be blameless וְ֝נִקֵּ֗יתִי 5352 Conj-w│V-Nifal-ConjPerf-1cs ( wə·niq·qê·ṯî) and cleansed מִפֶּ֥שַֽׁע 6588 Prep-m│N-ms ( mip·pe·ša‘) transgression. רָֽב׃ 7227 Adj-ms ( rāḇ) of great

יִֽהְי֥וּ <WH1961> yih·yū be לְרָצ֨וֹן׀ <WH7522> lə·rā·ṣō·wn pleasing אִמְרֵי־ <WH561> ’im·rê- May the words פִ֡י <WH6310> p̄î of my mouth וְהֶגְי֣וֹן <WH1902> wə·heḡ·yō·wn and the meditation לִבִּ֣י <WH3820> lib·bî of my heart לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> lə·p̄ā·ne·ḵā in Your sight, יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD, צוּרִ֥י <WH6697> ṣū·rî my Rock וְגֹאֲלִֽי׃ <WH1350> wə·ḡō·’ă·lî and my Redeemer.
